title: Bug 18163 - Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163 - The 'Add Import' feature should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
OB: When using the 'Add Import' feature, the system does not ignore leading/trailing whitespace when making a selection with 'Shift + Ctrl + Right'.
EB: When using the 'Add Import' feature and making a selection with 'Shift + Ctrl + Right', the system should ignore any leading/trailing whitespace and provide the correct import statement.
SR:
1. Open the file that requires an import.
2. Position the cursor in the line where the import statement should be added.
3. Press 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' to select the desired text.
4. Right-click and select 'Add Import' from the context menu.
5. Verify that the system correctly adds the import statement without including any leading/trailing whitespace.
